title: bOING bOING Issue 02
creator: Happy Mutants
description: bOING bOING started as a zine in 1988 by Mark Frauenfelder and Carla Sinclair, his wife. Issues were subtitled "The World's Greatest Neurozine". Associate editors included Gareth Branwyn, Jon Lebkowsky, and Paco Nathan. Along with Mondo 2000 , bOING bOING was an influence in the development of the cyberpunk subculture. It reached a maximum circulation of 17,500 copies. Common themes include technology, futurism, science fiction, gadgets, intellectual property, Disney and left-wing politics. The last issue of the zine was #15. Contents introduction sedentary nervosa - antero alli eightball - a comic book review never underestimate the power of the surrealist manifesto - david b twisted image - ace backwords film review- steve posner graham crackers for my brain carla frauenfelder zine reviews fun stuff! - culling the weird from reality boing-boing neato people: cappy hubbard stickbox - a comic book review quake counselling - rudy rucker ribofunk - paul di filippo rudy rucker's cellular automata lab beetlebrow the sign maker accoustic brain research ramsay - chris ramsay gob - dennis worden exciting news! * uncredited material by mark frauenfelder
